title: Faker IS A Cheater [PROOF]
body:
SKT T1 Faker, thought of as the best player in the world by the majority of players has finally been called out. Please ban him from future tournaments as this not acceptable, I can't believe this hasn't been discovered earlier.

Evidence:

https://i.gyazo.com/bc385753bdd8aa61f352b3f95e13f5dd.png
https://i.gyazo.com/7863f79aa8b5fb432fe551c9cb14bdf9.png
https://i.gyazo.com/f8575bb4c1da6ec976cff2938846f18f.gif

replies.body: ...and this is why people say google translate is beef

Don't want to be a grammar Nazi, but as a Korean, I am Faker doesn't quite translate to 'I am a cheater' from Korean, then back to English. Technically speaking, it should translate to, "My name is Faker", as the first sentence lacks an 'a'.

Sorry. I'll go back to my summer holiday calculus study.

So I'm a dog because my names Mutley... pure logic

please don't be jealous of fakers skills and even if faker was a cheater the officials would have picked it up.
Mutley, this is clearly a joke son. CTFD
IDK this summoner is level 27 and probably a bronze smurf. yeah I know I'm silver but I don't go around calling people a cheater.
